activities: The Allied Group enters into printing, kitting, fulfillment, mailing and email marketing agreements with its clients in the EU or Switzerland which may include the processing of information relating to their clients' customers. In these agreements, the EU or Swiss client agrees and recognizes that it is the 'data controller' for the purposes of data protection legislation. This means that our EU or Swiss clients are responsible for complying with the data protection legislation in the relevant Member State national law before it sends its customer data to The Allied Group for processing. Any data processed by The Allied Group is only disclosed to third parties at the request and direction of its European client as the data controller, or when required by law. Any information that our EU or Swiss clients identify as sensitive will be treated as such.
